Name: 了不起的棋盘
About the game: Through this game, players can design their favorite chess games, or improve the playing methods of existing chess types, and then conduct local or LAN games. From the perspective of computer game lovers, this game can be used as an AI platform, and players can write their own AI engine to fight.
